problems.title: Permutation In String (Sliding Window)
problems.description:
Given two strings s1 and s2, return true if s2 contains a permutation of s1, or false otherwise.
In other words, return true if one of s1's permutations is the substring of s2.

Input Format:
First line: string s1.
Second line: string s2.

Output Format:
Print "true" if s2 contains a permutation of s1, otherwise "false".
problems.examples:
Sample Input
ab
eidbaooo

Sample Output
true
problems.constraints:
1 <= s1.length, s2.length <= 10^4
s1 and s2 consist of lowercase English letters.
hintsList: Think about how to use a sliding window to optimize the solution.
Consider using a frequency map or two pointers to track the window state.
